events.message: I recently received my order and noticed that the product has multiple scratches and a faulty button that doesn’t work.
The reported issue was reviewed and classified as a Product Defect due to damage and malfunction described by the customer.
The case has been assigned to an agent specialized in handling product defects for further assistance.
Hello! I’m very sorry to hear about the issues with your product. I’m here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched areas and the faulty button to help us assess the damage better?
Sure, I have attached clear pictures showing the scratches on the surface and the button that does not respond when pressed.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you either a replacement unit sent immediately or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know your preference.
I would appreciate a replacement. Thank you for handling this quickly and offering options.
We have processed your replacement order, and it will be shipped within the next 24 hours. You will receive a tracking number soon.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement product has arrived and works properly. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Yes, the replacement arrived today in perfect condition and the faulty button is no longer an issue. Thanks for the great support!
We are glad your issue has been resolved. Closing the case now, but feel free to reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
